full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 136 of 197 2677
LCHVMAX4 Healy - direct
1 honest.
2 Q. And how old were you in '96?
3 A. I was born in 1974, so in my twenties.
4 Q. What were your impressions of Ghislaine Maxwell as a boss?
5 A. She's fantastic.
6 Q. Why do you say that?
7 A. She taught me a lot. I respected her. She was tough. But she was great.
8 
9 Q. Did she ever tell you not to look people in the eye when you were talking to them?
10 A. No.
11 
12 Q. Did she ever give you directions about how you should speak to other people?
13 A. No.
14 
15 Q. In your capacity of running around, did you ever work out of any other location besides 457 Madison?
16 A. No.
17 
18 Q. Did you ever go to any of Mr. Epstein's properties?
19 A. The only time I went, I went to Zorro Ranch. My sister got into a very bad car accident and broke her jaw. And Ghislaine was kind enough to take me there. I was working, but at least to set eyes on my sister because she was so hurt.
20 
21 
22 to set eyes on my sister because she was so hurt.
23 Q. And where was your sister working at that time?
24 A. She was on the ranch.
25 Q. And do you know how long she worked on the ranch?
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014242
